Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1983...
Released by St. Louis on 3/2/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 3/2/1983 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 8/2/1983 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 6/8/1984 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Chicago (A) on 7/31/1986 (Going to CHC: RF M. Young. Going to CHW: P R. Dibble, P A. Ashby, P T. Ferreira, SS W. Weiss, C N. Santovenia)...
Earned first career win on 7/21/1990...
Released by Chicago (A) on 4/1/1994...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 9/1/1995 to a 1-year deal worth $640,000 per year...
Injured on 8/20/1996 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for entire career...
